short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Payment and transaction signing extension for iRietumu, Internet banking of Rietumu Bank (Latvia).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows quick and easy way to digitally sign payments and transactions in iRietumu Internet Banking with your certificate.
